title: phaseshift~
description: The `phaseshift~` object is a 2nd order allpass filter that alters the phase of an audio signal without changing its gain. It shifts the phase from 0 to 360 degrees, with a specified frequency point where the shift is 180 degrees, and a 'Q' parameter controlling the steepness of this phase change. It can be used to create frequency cancellations when combined with the original signal.
